entry.title: New release for RecipeSage: v2.15.4
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix(l10n): translations update from weblate.recipesage.com by @recipesage-weblate in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1432
  • fix(l10n): translations update from weblate.recipesage.com by @recipesage-weblate in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1433
  • fix(l10n): translations update from weblate.recipesage.com by @recipesage-weblate in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1434
  • fix(l10n): translations update from weblate.recipesage.com by @recipesage-weblate in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1437
  • Update README.md (add links) by @sikanderiqbal in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1438
  • test: rework trpc test set up by @UlianaPurtova in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1431
  • fix: various webextension issues by @julianpoy in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1439

New Contributors

  • @sikanderiqbal made their first contribution in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1438

Full Changelog: https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/compare/v2.15.3...v2.15.4

entry.title: New release for RecipeSage: v2.15.5
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix(l10n): translations update from weblate.recipesage.com by @recipesage-weblate in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1441
  • chore(deps): bump the npm_and_yarn group across 1 directory with 9 updates by @dependabot in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1427
  • chore(deps): bump the npm_and_yarn group across 1 directory with 14 updates by @dependabot in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1442
  • Update uk-ua.json by @zaharchenko-yurka in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1456
  • fix(l10n): translations update from weblate.recipesage.com by @recipesage-weblate in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1450
  • fix: scrolling lost on recipe edit and unlabeled filter by @julianpoy in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1457

Full Changelog: https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/compare/v2.15.4...v2.15.5

entry.title: New release for RecipeSage: v2.15.7
